title: Interpretation of a gorilla in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a gorilla in a dream: Gorillas are considered a frightening animal and a predatory animal at the same time, so seeing them in a dream is one of the things that makes the dreamer feel panicked and afraid, and this is what makes him search hard to find it. Through the meaning and interpretation of this dream, the skilled scholar and translator Muhammad Ibn Sirin provided some interpretations that clarify the meaning of this dream for those who see a gorilla in their dreams, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of a gorilla in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a gorilla In a dream, it means that there is a fraudster in the dreamer’s life and he must be careful. In the event that one sees that he is fighting a gorilla and defeating it, this indicates that he will get sick, but he will quickly recover from his illness. In the event of a dispute with the gorilla who wins in the end, this indicates A serious and potentially fatal illness for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing a gorilla in a dream and says that when you see yourself buying a gorilla in a dream or taking it from a dear person, this indicates fraud and deception to which the dreamer will be exposed. If you see yourself eating gorilla meat In a dream, this is an excellent indicator of the fears and problems that the dreamer faces. If one sees in a dream that a gorilla has bitten him, this indicates hostility between him and his relatives. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a gorilla in her dream, this means that she knows a deceitful young man. He wants to deceive her and she must be careful. Also, seeing a gorilla in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of an irreligious man in that girl’s life. If you see a gorilla in an unmarried girl’s dream, this may mean that she will marry a man who will cause her many fears and problems. Interpretation Seeing a gorilla in a dream for a single woman: A married woman. If she sees a gorilla in a dream, this means that there is a man in her life who is very cunning and deceitful. Seeing a gorilla in a married woman’s dream also indicates poverty, loss of money, and loss of blessings. It also indicates that the woman will face many problems. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman dreaming of a gorilla means that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing a gorilla in a dream for a pregnant woman also means that she will receive good news, as well as that her birth will be easy. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla In a dream for a man: For a man to see a gorilla in a dream means that there is a cunning person in his life who is trying to undermine the dreamer and also indicates many problems that the dreamer faces. A man seeing a gorilla indicates the presence of an unjust and unjust person who eats forbidden money. When a man sees in a dream that he is very afraid Of gorillas, this indicates the comfort and security that the dreamer experiences. In conclusion, it is said that all the animals that you saw in a dream, but some animals do not like much of what you saw in a dream because they are frightening and frightening, and this is what makes them seek to interpret many dreams and resort to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others. From the commentators.

title: Interpretation of seeing animals in a dream Animals in a dream

preview.html: Animals in a dream, especially since such a vision is considered among the confusing visions, and it is not clear whether it is a good vision or among the unpleasant visions, and many interpreters have paid attention to clarifying these meanings, and the implications they contain. These dreams, and many people who were interested in learning their meanings, and along these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing animals in a dream. Animals in a dreamThis vision differs in the interpretations it includes, and this is based on the type of animal seen in the dream, as some of them can be good signs. And good news for the dreamer, and some of them can be isolated from him, and along these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing animals in a dream is also: Seeing a deer in a dream is a sign of prestige and victory over enemies. While if a person sees a lion in a dream, then this vision is evidence of the presence of an unjust ruler. Very or it is evidence that the date is approaching. In addition, seeing a rabbit is a sign of a cowardly man or woman, while seeing a slaughtered rabbit is a sign of marriage to a woman who does not exist. But if one sees a yellow and black cow in a dream, this indicates the year Full of happiness. Seeing goats in a dream is a sign of a distinguished man in appearance and appearance. See also: Playing the flute in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail for unmarried women. Seeing animals in a dream for a married womanAs it is known that the visions that people see in a dream differ from each other in interpretations And the interpretations it contains, and this is based on the social status of the viewer, and many dream interpreters explain these interpretations, and along these lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing animals in a dream for a married woman is also: The scholar Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman sees in a dream a large group of animals attacking her house She wants to enter him, and she is trying in every way to close the windows and doors so that she does not enter. It is a sign that this woman will do a lot to avoid problems in her life, and she will be under God’s protection and protection. Whereas if a married woman dreams that she is training and taming animals. This vision is evidence As a woman, she does not find it difficult to do anything. Also, Almighty God honors her with an abundance of goodness, and any problem she faces will be solved. But if a married woman sees that she is killing a predatory animal. It is evidence of his ability to get rid of enemies, as he will be able to get rid of everyone. See also: A detailed explanation by Ibn Sirin about seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream. Seeing strange animals in a dream. It is one of the strange visions for many people that makes them curious to know their interpretations and meanings, and it can be good or good visions or it can be a bad vision, and along these lines We will explain it. The interpretation of seeing strange animals in a dream is also: If you see snakes, they become pets. This indicates that there are people in the dreamer’s life that he must be careful of. Moreover, if one sees in a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a shroud according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Shroud of Ibn Sirin: The Shroud in a dream is an element of failure in romantic and committed relationships. The Shroud in a dream may indicate the loss of some people in the dreamer’s life. The Shroud in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s life in general. The Shroud in a dream is evidence of freedom from sins and transgressions. Whoever sees In a dream, he makes a shroud for the dead, this indicates that he does good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about a shroud for a single woman. A shroud in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of deception, cunning, and lying. Seeing a white shroud in a girl’s dream indicates marriage, but it did not take place. A black shroud in a dream is evidence of death. Seeing the green shroud in happiness and joy. Interpretation of a dream about a shroud for a married woman. The black shroud in a married woman’s dream shows the worries and problems that befall her. Perhaps a shroud in a dream for a married woman is an indication of illness and death. The green shroud indicates pregnancy in the near future or money that she will obtain. The shroud Green denotes a good husband. Interpretation of a dream about a shroud in a dream about a man. If a man sees in a dream that he is covered with a shroud, this indicates the sins and worries that he is in. Look at the man inside. The dream about the presence of a person in the shroud is an indication of the approach of this person. When seeing a dead person wrapped, This indicates the goodness that the dreamer will receive. Buying a shroud in a dream is considered a welcome vision for many. Buying a white shroud in a dream is a sign of marriage. Seeing buying a black shroud is evidence of nourishing the dreamer with knowledge and wisdom. A green shroud in a man’s dream indicates travel. Interpretation Dream of a shroud for NabulsiIf someone sees in a dream that he begins to choose a shroud from among many different shrouds, this indicates the loss of a loved one. Buying a shroud in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, as it is a symbol of reform. Whoever sees in a dream that someone brings him a shroud, this indicates On the many blessings that the dreamer will receive. In some visions, shrouds may indicate knowledge and civilization. Interpretation of a dream about a shroud for a pregnant woman. The white shroud in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the goodness that she will obtain. The shroud in a dream is pregnant, which is a sign of performing the Hajj obligation soon. The white shroud indicates the safety of the newborn. Seeing a person wrapped in a dead person in a dream. Feeling afraid. Seeing a person in a shroud indicates an internal fear of doing bad deeds, but he intends to repent and return to God Almighty. It symbolizes seeing a person under the protection of God Almighty. What the dreamer knows and is wrapped in is an indication of using deceptive methods to achieve goals. If you see a black shroud. In a dream, this indicates a serious illness that will affect the dreamer. The shroud of a dead person in a dream shows secrets that the dreamer is hiding from the people around him. Seeing the shroud on a living person is an indication that this person needs help or advice to get out of the problem he is suffering from. Interpretation of seeing the shroud of a living person. Seeing the shroud of a living person In a dream, it indicates the imminent death or loss of that person. Dreaming of seeing the shroud of a person who is still alive indicates the dreamer’s corruption, lack of conscience, and consumption of forbidden money. Seeing the shroud of a living person could indicate his love for him and his preservation.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the name Hamdi in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the name Hamdi in a dream. Dreams may have good or bad meanings. Therefore, we show in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about the name Hamdi in a dream and whether it is good or bad. All that and more.. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hamdi in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hamdi in a dream could be A sign to his partner by thanking God for his blessings, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees the name Hamdi, this may indicate glory to God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees the name Hamdi, it may indicate a personality that glorifies God for his blessings and appreciates his virtues, and God knows best. When she sees a name other than Hamdi, it can become Well, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Rizq in a dream could be an indication of kindness and giving, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing the name Rizq expresses the sustenance he will obtain, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees the name Rizq, this may indicate happiness, and God knows best. I know the unseen. When you see a married man, the name Rizq may indicate divine providence, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Mahmoud in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Mahmoud in a dream indicates goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees the name Mahmoud, this may mean her freedom from worry, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees the name Mahmoud, it may express the achievement of goals, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the name Mahmoud can also express goodness and living, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about the name Yara in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Yara in a dream could be an indication of generosity, and God knows best. When a girl sees someone other than Married: The name Yara in a dream can be a sign of goodness and care, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When you see a married man, the name Yara can lead to goodness and livelihood, God willing. If a young man sees the name Yara in a dream, it can be a sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream The name Muhammad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Muhammad in a dream could be a reference to a good outcome, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees the name Muhammad, it indicates blessings, and God knows best, as he can express the goodness and blessings he receives from God, God willing. When a single girl sees the name Muhammad, it may indicate that you Follow the Sunnah of the Prophet and religious teachings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hazem in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hazem in a dream can be an indication of stability in opinion, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the name Hazem, it can lead to firm control over matters, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees the name Hazem, it can It is an indication of stability and seriousness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the name Joseph in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Joseph in a dream could be a reference to the Gulf, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the name Joseph, this may be evidence of victory over her enemies, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a young man, the name Joseph expresses Freedom from distress, and God knows the unseen. The name Yusuf can also express freedom from sadness, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about the name Khadija in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the name Khadija in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dead in a dream: The dead are people whose years have passed and who have been transferred to the mercy of their Lord, and one day many of those close to them are lost due to their death, and it is considered one of the tragedies that shock us in life, and when. The dreamer sees a dead person in his dream. Of course, he will cry because of his longing, and he will be very curious to know the interpretation of the vision and the connotations it carries, whether good or bad. Therefore, in this article, we examine the most important things that the interpretation scholars said, so follow us....! The dead in the dream. Commentators say that Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive indicates ease of the situation and meeting all his needs in life. Also, if the dreamer sees a dead person whom he knows wearing new clothes in his dream, this means great relief and you will soon hear the happy news. Seeing the dead in a dream and crying over them indicates longing Strong for them and the lack of memories between them. If a man sees his parents dead and alive in his dream and feels intense fear, this indicates the nearness of relief and the disappearance of the fears surrounding him. The dreamer sees in his dream the resurrection of a dead person symbolizes his shaking hands with the Jews and Christians or the sects they follow. Seeing the dead and their resurrection In a person’s dream, it means that he has committed many sins and disobedience and needs to repent to God. If a single person sees in his dream the death of the deceased again and the crying of people around him, this symbolizes his close marriage to a girl he knows. The dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dead in A dream is one of the signs that brings good or evil to its owner, depending on his condition. If the fortuneteller sees a dead person smiling at her, this foretells the goodness and happiness that will soon knock on her door. Seeing the dead person crying in a dream symbolizes his intense need for supplication and charity, and this should be done. For his sake. If the dreamer sees a dead person wearing new clothes in his dream, it shows that he will soon be relieved and that he will receive good news soon. As for seeing a dead person in worn out clothes, and crying in the dreamer’s dream, this indicates a serious deficiency in his right to supplication and zakat. If the dreamer sees in a dream Receiving the deceased in her home and being happy, this will lead to happiness and blessings that will enter her life. The dead in the dream of single people. If an unmarried girl sees a dead father or mother in her dream, this means a strong longing for him and the inability to live without them. Also, seeing the dreamer in her dream, the dead He cries over her intensely, symbolizing the great need to pray and give charity. If the dreamer sees the deceased in his dream and he is in good condition and happy, this indicates great bliss with his Lord and his enjoyment of heaven. Seeing blame for the deceased in a girl’s dream indicates that she has committed many mistakes in her life and on her. To repent to God. The dreamer, if her marriage is delayed and she sees her deceased mother preaching to her, symbolizes the approaching date of her engagement to a suitable person for her. Seeing many dead people in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the coming of many good things and abundant livelihood that she will receive. If the female student sees Her dead friend in her dream, it revives her and wets her

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hyena by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hyena indicates many different meanings and interpretations that differ from one vision to another due to the events that occur during the vision, as well as the situation in which the dreamer finds himself and the various crises that he may go through in life in general, and through our article we will explain the most important interpretations shown in the interpretation of a dream about a hyena. In any case. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena. Seeing a hyena in a dream generally indicates the presence of some enemies around the dreamer who are constantly conspiring against him. Seeing a hyena in a dream wandering around the dreamer indicates the presence of an unjust person who will soon cause him difficulties in his living. The person who dreams that there is a hyena If a small child tries to attack him, this indicates that he will soon suffer from a big problem. A hyena in a dream that attacks the dreamer indicates that the dreamer will face some obstacles in his life while fulfilling all his desires. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a hyena in a dream indicates the injustice that He catches up with God in some matters. Seeing a hyena looking at a fortuneteller from afar indicates conspiracies that are conspiring against him and he should be very careful. If you see a big hyena in a dream, it means that you will hear some bad news and shocks in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that there A hyena defending him, this is evidence that he will get rid of some problems soon. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a single woman: Seeing a hyena in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will soon face some problems in the field of work. If an unmarried woman sees that there is a hyena in her house, this is evidence of the presence There are some enemies around her and she has to be very careful. A hyena in a dream that attacks an unmarried woman indicates that she will get into a big problem and needs help. Seeing a hyena in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will suffer from a great emotional crisis and a feeling of sadness. If the unmarried woman sees that There is a hyena looking at her from afar, so this is evidence that she will soon marry someone she loves. A white hyena in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates an improvement in her psychological state and lasting success. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a married woman: If you see a hyena for a married woman in a dream, this means that she will face some Problems soon. If a married woman sees that there is a hyena in her house, this is evidence that she will soon face some debts and financial crises. Seeing a hyena for a married woman in a dream is evidence that someone close to her is jealous of her and she should be very careful. Black hyena for a married woman in The dream is evidence that she will hear some bad news about someone she loves. A married woman sees in her dream that there is a big hyena in her house and is defending her, this is evidence that she will soon regain all her rights and be freed from her worries. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a pregnant womanIf you see a pregnant hyena in a dream, It means that you will suffer from a health problem during pregnancy and you will be sad. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is fighting a big hyena means that she will face a big financial crisis and that she will need help. Hyena

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband going for Umrah

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband going for Umrah in a dream is not included in the interpretations, but it conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a husband going for Umrah in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband is going for Umrah in a dream, this may indicate his good obedience and worship of God, Blessed and Most High. The husband going for Umrah in a dream may indicate It indicates changes in the events that are occurring in his life at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband going for Umrah in a dream indicates the reward and rewards that the husband will receive during this period, and God knows best. Dreaming of the husband going for Umrah in a dream may indicate high status and prestige. The high level that the husband has reached during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband leaving in a dream: In the event that a woman sees that her husband is leaving, this may indicate his need for great help during this time. A woman’s dream of her husband leaving her may indicate a feeling of disappointment or despair. During this time, if a woman sees her husband leaving her, this may indicate severe pain that she feels, anxiety, and tension from her husband. A dream about a husband leaving his wife in a dream may indicate his serious suffering or exposure to a major problem arising between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband on a bus trip In a dream, seeing her husband going on a bus trip may indicate great sadness that he faces during this time and needs to ask God for help. If a woman sees that her husband is going on a bus trip in a dream, this may indicate his inability to have great control over his life during this time. Period. A dream about a husband going on a bus trip in a dream may indicate some changes occurring in their lives in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a husband going on a bus trip in a dream may indicate the social situation that will change in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a woman going with her deceased husband in a dream: The woman’s decision to go with her deceased husband in a dream may indicate that she was feeling very afraid about something at that time. If the woman sees that she is going with her deceased husband, this may indicate the deceased’s anger at the woman’s behavior in This period, and God knows best. If you see the deceased husband coming to pick up his wife in a dream, this may indicate the comfort and security that the wife feels after extreme fatigue and suffering during this period. Seeing the husband coming back to life to take his wife in a dream may indicate imminent relief. Which will befall him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about going to a marriage examination in a dream: If they see the husband going for an examination in a dream, this may indicate positive changes in their lives during this period, and God knows best. Seeing your husband going for some tests in a dream may mean that he is facing A problem and that he will overcome it, thanks to God. It is possible to see the husband going to the examination in the dream, indicating the events that he is going through in a changed way and must ask God for help. So whoever saw in her dream that her husband was going to the examination in a dream, this may indicate material changes. Significant may occur in c

title: What is the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing an appointment in a dream: Seeing appointments is considered one of the praiseworthy and favorite visions for many because of its positive effects, and jurists and commentators have unanimously agreed to approve of this vision. Which in one way or another affects the context of the dream negatively and positively. Seeing a date in a dream. Seeing dates expresses wellness, safety, halal nutrition, blessed solutions, spreading kindness, achieving goals and objectives, meeting demands and goals, and meeting needs. Whoever sees that he is eating dates, this indicates blessings, payment, reciting the Qur’an, collecting money, and eating. Dates are interpreted as benefiting those who work in them, whether teaching, trading, or selling. A gift of dates expresses kindness and good speech, the arrival of good news, friendliness and initiative for peace, doing voluntary work, speaking the truth, ending disputes, repentance and guidance, and returning to righteousness and justice. Collecting dates symbolizes marriage to a woman of Eastern origin or education, and if the dates are collected before they are ripe, then he will reap knowledge and not benefit from it. Seeing dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that dates are good, money, goodness, abundance, and abundance of livelihood, and whoever eats dates reads the Qur’an and enjoys it. By hearing him, praising him, flattering him, and hearing good speech. Dates indicate money, whether they are a lot or little, they indicate the amount of money, and good dates are better than bad dates, and good dates symbolize knowledge and wisdom, acquiring them, and achieving goals and objectives. Whoever dreams that he weighs dates, these are great spoils. If the dreamer sees that he is feeding others dates, this indicates that he will benefit from the party that feeds him, and if he eats spoiled dates, then this will be the case. A correct word that is meant to be wrong. Dry dates symbolize some livelihood, and eating dates is evidence of reward or reward for the type and value of work. What is the interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman? Dates in her dream symbolize happy news, a great occasion, a blessed marriage, and blessings in her endeavors. The gift of dates is evidence of help, great reward, and valuable advice. Buying dates represents the right decisions, successful choices, and trying useful experiences that will reap great benefits. Giving dates is evidence of good character, initiating benevolence, and helping the needy. Distributing dates indicates increasing religion and this world, and satisfying needs. And benefiting from it. What is the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a married woman? Dates in her dream represent well-being and psychological comfort, removing distress and anxiety, achieving stability and calm, skill in work and good behavior among people, and her presence in the heart of her husband. Taking dates indicates praise for her works, and livelihood. Who comes to her without a doubt, and eating dates indicates kindness and generosity in livelihood and opening the doors of relief, and distributing dates symbolizes charity to the poor and benefiting from that. Giving an appointment to someone you know indicates a benefit derived from him and it may be valuable knowledge or advice. Seeing an appointment in a dream for a woman Pregnant: The vision of dating is considered a good thing for a pregnant woman, as it indicates the

title: Interpretation of a dream about Muhammad bin Salman with boring details 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of Muhammad bin Salman in detailThe dreams that we dream about can vary, so you sometimes find us dreaming of people we know and people we do not know, and sometimes we dream of food and other travel moments or children. Today and until today, different, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of Muhammad bin Salman in detail. What are the interpretations of this dream follow us. Muhammad bin Salman: He is Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Crown Prince of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Deputy for Political and Security Affairs, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Defense, and held the position of the Saudi Council for Economic and Development Affairs. The son of King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud holds a degree in Law from King Saud University. He is 35 years old. He assumed the position of Crown Prince in 2017. He was born in the capital, Riyadh. Interpretation of a dream about presidents and kings in general: In general, seeing presidents and kings in power shows its interpretations according to the condition of that president or king, whether it is good or bad. Bad, and this dream may just be self-talk that stems from admiration for this person. Or the ruler. And his many thoughts about him. A detailed interpretation of the dream of Muhammad bin Salman and what are its interpretations? In the beginning, seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman bodes well. If an unmarried young man dreams of seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman, this indicates his close marriage and his life at home like princes, and it may also be It is news for him that he will assume an important position in the state. If an unmarried girl dreams of her marriage to Prince Muhammad bin Salman, this means that her marriage or engagement is approaching, if she is not engaged. If an unmarried girl dreams of her marriage to Prince Muhammad bin Salman, this indicates Her marriage to a prominent figure who has a high status in society. This dream can also be interpreted as the death of worry and sadness, and the fairness of the dreamer’s affairs in this world and the hereafter. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is carrying food for Prince Mohammed bin Salman may be sad, but it will end soon and he will be provided with food from a wider range of people. Doors. Whoever sees in a dream that the prince has been deposed, this indicates that he will take over the state. Whoever sees in a dream that the prince is wearing his clothes, this indicates negligence in the affairs of his government, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the heir and sitting with him: There are many interpretations of this dream, such as Whoever sees in a dream that he is sitting with the heir on the throne, this means that he will obtain a high position, abundant livelihood, and many good things. Whoever dreams of a caliph for a country other than his own, this indicates that the dreamer will travel to that country and obtain sufficient sustenance. If he A debtor dreams of seeing an heir, this means that he will pay his debt soon, and God knows best. If a person dreams of an heir and he is anxious and worried, this indicates that his worries will go away, and God knows best. If someone who is imprisoned with an heir dreams, this means that his worries will go away and he will be released from prison. Interpretation of a dream about Muhammad bin Salman in detail for an unmarried girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of Prince Muhammad bin Salman, this indicates her marriage to a high-ranking person. If the dreamer is a girl who seeks knowledge, this indicates her excellence in her studies. If she is a girl,
